item.title: Supreme Court strikes down EPA rules on discharge of water pollution
item.description: The justices ruled that the agency cannot impose generic prohibitions against violating water quality standards.

item.title: Supreme Court seems likely to block Mexico’s lawsuit vs. U.S. gunmakers
item.description: Justices expressed deep skepticism Tuesday about an unusual lawsuit by the Mexican government that seeks to hold major U.S. firearms manufacturers acc...

item.title: Live updates: Trump to deliver address to joint session of Congress amid blowback on tariffs
